-spec count_complete_substrings(Word :: unicode:unicode_binary(), K :: integer()) -> integer().
count_complete_substrings(Word, K) ->
    WordList = unicode:characters_to_list(Word),
    count_valid_substrings(WordList, K, []).

count_valid_substrings([], _, Acc) ->
    length(Acc);
count_valid_substrings([H|T], K, Acc) ->
    Substrings = generate_substrings([H|T], K, []),
    count_valid_substrings(T, K, Acc ++ Substrings).

generate_substrings(_, 0, Acc) ->
    [lists:sort(Acc)];
generate_substrings([], _, Acc) when Acc =/= [] ->
    [lists:sort(Acc)];
generate_substrings([], _, _) ->
    [];
generate_substrings([H|T], K, Acc) ->
    NextAcc = case Acc of
                  [] -> [H];
                  [AH|_] -> case abs(H - AH) of
                                 0 -> [H|Acc];
                                 1 -> [H|Acc];
                                 2 -> [H|Acc];
                                 _ -> []
                             end
              end,
    if length(NextAcc) =:= K -> [lists:sort(NextAcc)];
       true -> generate_substrings(T, K, NextAcc)
    end.

-spec is_complete_substring(list(char()), integer()) -> boolean().
is_complete_substring(Substr, K) ->
    Freq = lists:foldl(fun(E, Acc) -> maps:update_with(E, fun(Val) -> Val + 1 end, 1, Acc) end, #{}, Substr),
    AllEqualK = maps:all(fun(_, Val) -> Val =:= K end, Freq),
    Seq = lists:seq(hd(Substr), lists:last(Substr)),
    Subset = maps:is_key_subset(maps:from_list([{X, true} || X <- Seq]), Freq),
    AllEqualK andalso Subset.
